sentences.en: Microcosmos is published by Firefly Books later this month.
sentences.cn: 《微观世界》将于本月底由萤火虫出版社出版。

sentences.en: The female of one species of firefly has learned to imitate the moves of another.
sentences.cn: 一种萤火虫的雌性学会了模仿另一种萤火虫的动作。

sentences.en: At hot summer nights, each firefly flashes its light in a pattern unique to its subspecies.
sentences.cn: 在炎热的夏夜，每只萤火虫都以其亚种特有的方式发光。
